name: SBI OTP Urgency Scam
description: Scammer impersonates SBI bank and creates urgency around account compromise, requesting OTP and account details to 'verify identity'.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT: Your SBI account has been compromised. Your account will be blocked in 2 hours. Share your account number and OTP immediately to verify your identity.
turns.notes: Initial urgency message with no extractable data yet.

turns.scammer_message: Sir/Madam, this is very urgent matter. Please call our senior verification officer at +91-9876543210 immediately. Your account security is at risk and we need to act fast.
turns.notes: Scammer introduces phone number for callback.

turns.scammer_message: For immediate resolution, transfer Rs 1 as verification amount to account number 1234567890123456 or UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank. This confirms your identity in our system.
turns.notes: Scammer reveals both bank account and UPI ID for 'verification transfer'.

turns.scammer_message: We have not received your verification yet. Please send Rs 1 to scammer.fraud@fakebank immediately otherwise your account will be permanently blocked. This is your final chance.
turns.notes: Scammer reinforces UPI ID with more urgency.

turns.scammer_message: FINAL WARNING: Your SBI account will be permanently deactivated in 30 minutes. Call +91-9876543210 now or send verification to 1234567890123456. After this, we cannot help you.
turns.notes: Final escalation repeating phone and bank account.
